attributes.action: ensure that the Severn Crossing accepts payment by credit/debit card and not just cash or cheque.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: For casual and occasional users, the Severn Crossing accepts only cash payments (the TAG prepayment scheme is for regular users only). This can be very inconvenient and slow, and is unlike most toll motorways, bridges and tunnels in Europe. This policy does nothing for Britain's image as a progressive and technologically competent nation.
